name: kafka
description: Apache Kafka running on top of Apache Mesos
preInstallNotes: The Apache Kafka DCOS Service implementation is alpha and there may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation or other discrepancies.
postInstallNotes:
The Apache Kafka DCOS Service is installed:
  docs   - https://github.com/mesos/kafka
  issues - https://github.com/mesos/kafka/issues
postUninstallNotes:
The Apache Kafka DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Please follow the instructions at http://docs.mesosphere.com/services/kafka/#uninstall to clean up any persisted state
